meanings.definition: The amount of space between characters in a line of text.
meanings.sent1: The letterspace in the document made it easier to read.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to adjust the letterspace for better readability.
meanings.sent3: The letterspace between the words was so wide, it looked like a river flowing through the text.
meanings.sent4: The letterspace in the old typewriter was like a vast desert between each letter.
meanings.sent5: The letterspace, like a gentle breeze, separated the characters gracefully.

meanings.definition: To adjust the spacing between characters in a line of text.
meanings.sent1: She had to letterspace the text to make it fit on the page.
meanings.sent2: Remember to letterspace before printing the final draft.
meanings.sent3: He letterspaced the words so much that they seemed to dance on the page.
meanings.sent4: Letterspacing the text was like giving each character its own little stage.
meanings.sent5: The designer carefully letterspaced the title to make it stand out.
